metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3596 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low.
metadata.Description:
A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in ImageMagick in versions prior to 7.0.10-31 in ReadSVGImage() in coders/svg.c. This issue is due to not checking the return value from libxml2's xmlCreatePushParserCtxt() and uses the value directly, which leads to a crash and segmentation fault.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3596` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
imagemagick-6-common - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
imagemagick-6.q16 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
imagemagick-6.q16hdri - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
imagemagick-common - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libimage-magick-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libimage-magick-q16-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libimage-magick-q16hdri-perl - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagick++-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagick++-6.q16-8 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagick++-6.q16hdri-8 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagickcore-6-arch-config - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagickcore-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagickcore-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagickcore-6.q16-6-extra - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagickcore-6.q16hdri-6-extra - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagickwand-6-headers - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagickwand-6.q16-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
libmagickwand-6.q16hdri-6 - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
perlmagick - 8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1
No subscription required

notes.Note: alexmurray> According to debian this only affects imagemagick7 but looking at the code and the patch I suspect the older versions shipped in Ubuntu are also vulnerable. eslerm> only affects creating PS/PDF file which policy.xml forbids (tested)

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8:6.9.11.60+dfsg-1.3build1').
